name: zlib-streams-ts
description: TypeScript-based Compression Streams API implementation using zlib, with support for deflate64 decompression.
author: Gildas Lormeau

scripts.coverage:run: rm -rf ./coverage && mkdir -p ./coverage && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=./coverage npm run test
scripts.coverage:report: deno coverage ./coverage --lcov --output=coverage/coverage.lcov && deno coverage ./coverage --json > coverage/coverage.json && deno coverage ./coverage --detailed > coverage/coverage.txt || true
scripts.coverage:c8: rm -rf ./coverage && npx c8 --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --report-dir=coverage npm run test
